item.title: Ultimate FrumBall and TUGOWAR!
item.dc:creator: @magicjim magicjim
item.description:
@magicjim wrote:

I think the sleep should be a bit shorter like this
program New;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

begin
SetupSRL;
repeat
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘v’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘x’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘n’));
Sleep(20);
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘v’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘x’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘n’))
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘b’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘c’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘m’));
Sleep(20);
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘b’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘m’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘c’));
If (FindColorTolerance(x, y, 3983593, 95, 10, 180, 45, 25))Or(FindColorTolerance(x, y, 3250869, 95, 10, 180, 45, 5))Then
begin
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘q’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘w’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘e’));
Sleep(20);
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘q’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘w’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘e’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘q’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘w’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘e’));
Sleep(20);
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘q’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘w’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘e’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘q’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘w’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘e’));
Sleep(15);
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘q’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘w’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘e’));
end;
until(False);
end.

Read full topic
